ResearchProjectDef.label: Chymerimancy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create xenogerms which can be implanted in a person to genetically modify them. Extract genepacks from living people using a gene extractor so you can reimplant their genes into someone else.

rulesStrings.li: subject->chymerimancy
subject->genetic implantation
subject_story->was uplifted by a scientist that focused on the genetically disadvantaged
subject_story->had [ANYPAWN_possessive] flesh stolen by a rogue biologist
subject_story->ran a genetic transfer clinic for the nobility
subject_gerund->crafting xenogerms

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Chymerimancy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build mutagenic furnaces, which allow a graft forge to create xenogerms of higher genetic complexity.

rulesStrings.li: subject->advanced chymerimancy
subject_story->extracted genes from a wandering rogue
subject_story->processed an entire village to create one set of higher genes
subject_story->began the slow process of uplift by implanting xenogerms into a primitive tribe
subject_gerund->constructing mutagenic furnaces
subject_gerund->processing genes

ResearchProjectDef.label: Archite Chymerimancy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows a graft forge to use up to two archite capsules to create seemingly impossible genes. Archite genes and archite capsules can be obtained from traders.
